mapper.select: SELECT DEF.FUNC_NAME, DEF.FUNC_DESC, DEF.FUNC_TYPE_FLAG, DEF.FUNC_GROUP, DEF.ASSEMBLY_FILE, DEF.ASSEMBLY_NAME, DEF.SHORT_CUT, DEF.ICON_INDEX, GRP.DISP_LEVEL, GRP.SEPARATOR, GRP.ADD_TOOL_BAR FROM MSECFUNDEF DEF, MSECGRPFUN GRP WHERE DEF.FUNC_NAME = GRP.FUNC_NAME AND GRP.FACTORY = 'DEMO' AND GRP.SEC_GRP_ID = 'ADMIN_GROUP' AND GRP.PROGRAM_ID = 'MESClient' ORDER BY GRP.DISP_LEVEL ASC
